Title: Requires gluten cross contamination safeguards in food establishments owned, operated or leased by any department or agency of the state
Summary: Requires gluten cross-contamination safeguards in food establishments owned, operated or leased by any department or agency of the state.
LawCode: Add ยง146-a, St Fin L; amd ยง206, Pub Health L; add ยง101-c, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the public health law and the education law, in relation to requiring gluten cross-contamination safeguards in food establishments owned, operated or leased by any department or agency of the state or the state university of New York
